job.name: Docker_Swarm

variable.name: INSTANCE_NAME
variable.description: The name of the service to be deployed.

variable.name: NODE_SOURCE
variable.description: If not empty, the workflow tasks will be run only on nodes belonging to the specified node source.

variable.name: TARGETED_NB_PA_NODES
variable.description: The number of targeted deployment nodes.

variable.name: TARGETED_NB_PA_HOSTS
variable.description: Minimum number of machines (hosts) that will be contained in the docker swarm infrastructure. This should correspond to the number of machines (VMs) contained in the target node source.

job.description: Create a Docker Swarm. TARGETED_PA_NODE_SOURCE_NAME refers to the targeted node source from which TARGETED_NB_PA_NODES ProActive nodes will be reserved for the Docker Swarm. The TARGETED_NB_PA_HOSTS refers to Minimum number of machines (hosts) that will be contained in the docker swarm infrastructure. This should correspond to the number of machines (VMs) contained in the target node source.

metadata.visualization:
start_swarm_manager  
 nothing  
 start_swarm_worker  
 propagate_variables_to_current_service  
 add_deployments_and_update_service
